Job Title: Data Science | DWH ETL | Machine Learning | Big Data Engineer
Profile Summary: Rai Shahnawaz is a Data Scientist and Data-Warehouse consultant with a strong mathematical and programming background. He is experienced in big data technologies , machine learning, statistics, and have worked on building large scale data warehouse solutions with integration of heterogeneous data sources on top of Google big-query (PaaS). He is currently working as a Data Scientist at ADDO-AI; the leading AI-based IT firm in Pakistan. Prior to joining ADDO-AI, he worked as a Research Associate for Data Science Lab (DSL) & Fin-tech Center at ITU where his collaborative work with University of Washington’s DFSRG group was focused on bias aware decision making and financial fraud mitigation on top of big data technologies. His research work for mitigating financial fraud and fairness in decision making for machine learning models are directly applicable to the legal, social, and economic domains particularly after strict privacy regulations like GDPR. Before that, he worked as software engineer for three years at i2c (PCI), which is a transaction processing multi-national company and a working partner with VISA network. At i2c, he was primarily responsible for efficient and effective analysis of customers’ product related issues using SQL queries (Informix DB) and application (JAVA) logs. He worked on a variety of product modules including OLAP, CMS, Distributed Schedulers, Campaign Management, Web Services API, and OLTP at Linux Platform.  Shahnawaz holds a degree of masters in computer science with a minor in Data Science from ITU and bachelors in computer science from FAST-NU, Lahore.
